text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse 5 symptoms of covid19. ONLY place testing is done is 45min away. Must get dr approval but I'm not considered high risk so I can't get into see dr til end of July! I don't get it, we can do home pregnancy testing, DNA ancestry, we can shit in a tub & send it to lab. #HomeTesting
